verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> vay-Hi now there was רָעָב֩ <WH7458> ra-'Av Then there was a famine בִּימֵ֨י <WH3117> bi-Mei in the days דָוִ֜ד <WH1732> da-Vid of David שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> sha-Losh three שָׁנִ֗ים <WH8141> sha-Nim, years שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> sha-Nah year אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> sha-Nah, year וַיְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <WH1245> vay-vak-Kesh enquired דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> da-Vid and David אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> pe-Nei of יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD ס sa-Mek וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer answered יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> sha-'Ul [It is] for Saul וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- about בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit house הַדָּמִ֔ים <WH1818> had-da-Mim, and for [his] bloody עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- he הֵמִ֖ית <WH4191> he-Mit because he slew אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַגִּבְעֹנִֽים׃ <WH1393> hag-giv-'o-Nim. the Gibeonites

וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra called הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech And the king לַגִּבְעֹנִ֖ים <WH1393> lag-giv-'o-Nim the Gibeonites וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem; to וְהַגִּבְעֹנִ֞ים <WH1393> ve-hag-giv-'o-Nim unto them (now the Gibeonites לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo were not מִבְּנֵ֧י <WH1121> mib-be-Nei [were] not of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel הֵ֗מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah, like כִּ֚י <WH3588> ki for אִם־ <WH518> 'im- but מִיֶּ֣תֶר <WH3499> mi-Ye-ter but of the remnant הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri, of the Amorites וּבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei and the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel נִשְׁבְּע֣וּ <WH7650> nish-be-'U had sworn לָהֶ֔ם <WH1992> la-Hem, like וַיְבַקֵּ֤שׁ <WH1245> vay-vak-Kesh sought שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> sha-'Ul unto them and Saul לְהַכֹּתָ֔ם <WH5221> le-hak-ko-Tam, to slay בְּקַנֹּאת֥וֹ <WH7065> be-kan-no-To them in his zeal לִבְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> liv-nei- to the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וִיהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> vi-hu-Dah. Judah

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> da-Vid Wherefore David אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַגִּבְעֹנִ֔ים <WH1393> hag-giv-'o-Nim, unto the Gibeonites מָ֥ה <WH4100> mah What אֶעֱשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> 'e-'e-Seh What shall I do לָכֶ֑ם la-Chem; וּבַמָּ֣ה <WH4100> u-vam-Mah and how אֲכַפֵּ֔ר <WH3722> 'a-chap-Per, for you;and wherewith shall I make the atonement וּבָרְכ֖וּ <WH1288> u-va-re-Chu that ye may bless אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- נַחֲלַ֥ת <WH5159> na-cha-Lat the inheritance יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. Jehovah

וַיֹּ֧אמְרוּ <WH559> vai-Yo-me-ru said ל֣וֹ lo הַגִּבְעֹנִ֗ים <WH1393> hag-giv-'o-Nim, And the Gibeonites אֵֽין־ <WH369> 'ein- have; לִי li כלָ֜נוּ La-nu קכֶּ֤סֶף <WH3701> Ke-sef unto him We will have no silver וְזָהָב֙ <WH2091> ve-za-Hav nor gold עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- of שָׁא֣וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul Saul וְעִם־ <WH5973> ve-'im- or בֵּית֔וֹ <WH1004> bei-To, nor of his house וְאֵֽין־ <WH369> ve-'ein- no לָ֥נוּ La-nu אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> 'ish any man לְהָמִ֣ית <WH4191> le-ha-Mit neither for us shalt thou kill בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> be-Yis-ra-'El; in Israel וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said מָֽה־ <WH4100> mah- whatever אַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> 'at-Tem you אֹמְרִ֖ים <WH559> 'o-me-Rim What ye shall say אֶעֱשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> 'e-'e-Seh [that] will I do לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru And they answered אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech, the king הָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> ha-'Ish The man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who כִּלָּ֔נוּ <WH3615> kil-La-nu, that consumed וַאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> va-'a-Sher and who דִּמָּה־ <WH1819> dim-mah- us and that devised לָ֑נוּ La-nu; נִשְׁמַ֕דְנוּ <WH8045> nish-Mad-nu against us [that] we should be destroyed מֵֽהִתְיַצֵּ֖ב <WH3320> me-hit-yatz-Tzev from remaining בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol any גְּבֻ֥ל <WH1366> ge-Vul in any of the coasts יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

יְנָתָן־ ye-na-ton- כיֻתַּן־ <WH5414> yut-tan- be given לָ֜נוּ La-nu קשִׁבְעָ֤ה <WH7651> shiv-'Ah Let seven אֲנָשִׁים֙ <WH376> 'a-na-Shim men מִבָּנָ֔יו <WH1121> mib-ba-Nav, of his sons וְהוֹקַֽעֲנוּם֙ <WH3363> ve-ho-ka-'a-Num unto us and we will hang them up לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, unto the LORD בְּגִבְעַ֥ת <WH1390> be-giv-'At in Gibeah שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul of Saul בְּחִ֣יר <WH972> be-Chir did choose יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; [whom] the LORD ס sa-Mek וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech And the king אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I אֶתֵּֽן׃ <WH5414> 'et-Ten. be delivered

וַיַּחְמֹ֣ל <WH2550> vai-yach-Mol spared הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech, But the king עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- because מְפִי־ <WH4648> me-fi- Mephibosheth בֹ֖שֶׁת <WH1322> Vo-shet ashamed בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יְהוֹנָתָ֣ן <WH3083> ye-ho-na-Tan of Jonathan בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son שָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul; of Saul עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- because שְׁבֻעַ֤ת <WH7621> she-vu-'At oath יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh because of the LORD'S אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בֵּֽינֹתָ֔ם <WH996> bei-no-Tam, was between בֵּ֣ין <WH996> bein between דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> da-Vid, that [was] between them between David וּבֵ֖ין <WH996> u-Vein was between יְהוֹנָתָ֥ן <WH3083> ye-ho-na-Tan and Jonathan בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son שָׁאֽוּל׃ <WH7586> sha-'Ul. of Saul

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach took הַמֶּ֡לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech But the king אֶת־ <WH853> 'e-toSh- שְׁ֠נֵי <WH8147> nei the two בְּנֵ֨י <WH1121> be-Nei sons רִצְפָּ֤ה <WH7532> ritz-Pah of Rizpah בַת־ <WH1323> vat- the daughter אַיָּה֙ <WH345> 'ai-Yah of Aiah אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom יָלְדָ֣ה <WH3205> Yal-dah whom she bare לְשָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> le-sha-'Ul, unto Saul אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אַרְמֹנִ֖י <WH764> 'ar-mo-Ni Armoni וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מְפִבֹ֑שֶׁת <WH4648> me-fi-Vo-shet; and Mephibosheth וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et חֲמֵ֗שֶׁת <WH2568> cha-Me-shet, and the five בְּנֵי֙ <WH1121> be-Nei sons מִיכַ֣ל <WH4324> mi-Chal of Michal בַּת־ <WH1323> bat- the daughter שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul, of Saul אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom יָלְדָ֛ה <WH3205> Yal-dah whom she brought up לְעַדְרִיאֵ֥ל <WH5741> le-'ad-ri-'El for Adriel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son בַּרְזִלַּ֖י <WH1271> bar-zil-Lai of Barzillai הַמְּחֹלָתִֽי׃ <WH4259> ham-me-cho-la-Ti. the Meholathite

וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֞ם <WH5414> vai-yit-te-Nem And he delivered בְּיַ֣ד <WH3027> be-Yad them into the hands הַגִּבְעֹנִ֗ים <WH1393> hag-giv-'o-Nim, of the Gibeonites וַיֹּקִיעֻ֤ם <WH3363> vai-yo-ki-'Um and they hanged בָּהָר֙ <WH2022> ba-Har them in the hill לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, the LORD וַיִּפְּל֥וּ <WH5307> vai-yip-pe-Lu and they fell; שִׁבַעְתָּיִם shi-va'-ta-yim כשְׁבַעְתָּ֖ם <WH7651> she-va'-Tam seven קיָ֑חַד <WH3162> Ya-chad; together; וְהֵם ve-hem כוְהֵ֨מָּה <WH1992> ve-Hem-mah like קהֻמְת֜וּ <WH4191> hum-Tu and were put to death בִּימֵ֤י <WH3117> bi-Mei in the days קָצִיר֙ <WH7105> ka-Tzir of harvest בָּרִ֣אשֹׁנִ֔ים <WH7223> ba-Ri-sho-Nim, in the first; תְחִלַּת te-chil-lat כבִּתְחִלַּ֖ת <WH8462> bit-chil-Lat Tachmonite קקְצִ֥יר <WH7105> ke-Tzir harvest שְׂעֹרִֽים׃ <WH8184> se-'o-Rim. of barley

וַתִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> vat-tik-Kach took רִצְפָּה֩ <WH7532> ritz-Pah And Rizpah בַת־ <WH1323> vat- the daughter אַיָּ֨ה <WH345> 'ai-Yah of Aiah אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַשַּׂ֜ק <WH8242> has-Sak sackcloth וַתַּטֵּ֨הוּ <WH5186> vat-tat-Te-hu and spread לָ֤הּ lah אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about הַצּוּר֙ <WH6697> hatz-Tzur it for her upon the rock מִתְּחִלַּ֣ת <WH8462> mit-te-chil-Lat from the beginning קָצִ֔יר <WH7105> ka-Tzir, of harvest עַ֛ד <WH5704> 'ad until נִתַּךְ־ <WH5413> nit-tach- dropped מַ֥יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim until water עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem and מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim; upon them out of heaven וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- neither נָתְנָה֩ <WH5414> na-te-Nah and suffered ע֨וֹף <WH5775> of neither the birds הַשָּׁמַ֜יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim of the air לָנ֤וּחַ <WH5117> la-Nu-ach to rest עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem on יוֹמָ֔ם <WH3119> yo-Mam, on them by day וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et חַיַּ֥ת <WH2416> chai-Yat nor the beasts הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> has-sa-Deh of the field לָֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> La-ye-lah. by night

וַיֻּגַּ֖ד <WH5046> vai-yug-Gad And it was told לְדָוִ֑ד <WH1732> le-da-Vid; David אֵ֧ת <WH853> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- what עָשְׂתָ֛ה <WH6213> 'a-se-Tah had done רִצְפָּ֥ה <WH7532> ritz-Pah what Rizpah בַת־ <WH1323> vat- the daughter אַיָּ֖ה <WH345> 'ai-Yah of Aiah פִּלֶ֥גֶשׁ <WH6370> pi-Le-gesh the concubine שָׁאֽוּל׃ <WH7586> sha-'Ul. of Saul

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> vai-Ye-lech went דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> da-Vid, And David וַיִּקַּ֞ח <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach and took אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַצְמ֤וֹת <WH6106> atz-Mot the bones שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> sha-'Ul of Saul וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et עַצְמוֹת֙ <WH6106> 'atz-mOt and the bones יְהוֹנָתָ֣ן <WH3083> ye-ho-na-Tan of Jonathan בְּנ֔וֹ <WH1121> be-No, his son מֵאֵ֕ת <WH853> me-'Et בַּעֲלֵ֖י <WH1167> ba-'a-Lei from the men יָבֵ֣ישׁ <WH3003> ya-Veish Jobesh גִּלְעָ֑ד <WH1568> gil-'Ad; Gilead אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> 'a-Sher who גָּנְב֨וּ <WH1589> ga-ne-Vu which had stolen אֹתָ֜ם <WH853> 'o-Tam מֵרְחֹ֣ב <WH7339> me-re-Cho them from the street בֵּֽית־ beit- שַׁ֗ן <WH1052> Shan, of Bethshan אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who; תְּלוּם te-lum כתְּלָא֥וּם <WH8518> te-la-'Um hang ק; שָׁם sham כהַפְּלִשְׁתִּים hap-pe-lish-tim כשָׁ֙מָּה֙ <WH8033> Sham-mah in it ק; פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> pe-lish-Tim, the Philistines קבְּי֨וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom them when הַכּ֧וֹת <WH5221> hak-Kot had slain פְּלִשְׁתִּ֛ים <WH6430> pe-lish-Tim where the Philistines אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul Saul בַּגִּלְבֹּֽעַ׃ <WH1533> bag-gil-Bo-a'. in Gilboa

וַיַּ֤עַל <WH5927> vai-Ya-'al And he brought up מִשָּׁם֙ <WH8033> mish-Sham there אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַצְמ֣וֹת <WH6106> atz-Mot from thence the bones שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul, of Saul וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et עַצְמ֖וֹת <WH6106> atz-Mot and the bones יְהוֹנָתָ֣ן <WH3083> ye-ho-na-Tan of Jonathan בְּנ֑וֹ <WH1121> be-No; his son וַיַּ֣אַסְפ֔וּ <WH622> vai-Ya-'as-Fu, and they gathered אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַצְמ֖וֹת <WH6106> atz-Mot the bones הַמּוּקָעִֽים׃ <WH3363> ham-mu-ka-'Im. of them that were hanged
